posts.post_title: WTB - T206 Bay & T206 Carey in SGC50 or better
posts.post_content:
Having a hard time tracking down these 2 T206 Southern Leaguers....Harry Bay & Scoops Carey.  Looking for these 2 cards in SGC50 or better.  No PSA please.
Thanks.
